NO.CAS-9(15)/98/PIC 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
       Date:       27.07.2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR No.   17/2010        
 
 
Sub: Renewal of Airport Entry Permit’s expired on 31.12.2009, 31.03.2010 & 
31.07.2010 reg,   
 
In Continuation to this Bureau AVSEC Circular No. 11/2010 dt. 
30.04.2010, validity of the existing computerized Airport Entry Passes (AEP) 
which expired on 31.12.2009, 31.03.2010 & 31st July, 2010 are further extended 
by 03 months. Now these AEP’s shall remain valid up to 31st October, 2010. This 
extension does not include Commercial AEPs.     
 
 
 
(Rohit Nandan) 
IAS 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution: As per the list attached.
